definition: Stars and Stripes, the flag of the United States
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: The evolution of the Stars and Stripes reflects the growth of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 的演变星条旗的增长反映了美国。

sentences.english: You can see the stars and stripes.
The song’s rousing refrain recalls the early struggles of a nation.
sentences.chinese: 《星条旗》那悠扬的副歌再现了建国初期的奋斗史。

sentences.english: This is the pattern of our current 50-star flag.
sentences.chinese: 这种模式正在为目前的50星条旗所使用。

sentences.english: A band, with fife and drum, played “The Star Spangled Banner.
sentences.chinese: 一个有鼓和横笛的乐队，演奏了“星条旗”。

sentences.english: Eventually The Star-Spangled Banner was performed and play began.
sentences.chinese: 最终，美国国歌《星条旗之歌》奏响了，比赛开始了。
星条旗是否还会再更改？

sentences.english: This only works for flags with an odd number of rows.
sentences.chinese: 这种模式只适用于行数为奇数的星条旗。

sentences.english: And we bear the glorious stars for the Union and the right.
sentences.chinese: 为了联邦和正义，我们扛起光荣的星条旗。

sentences.english: America's famous flag, the Star-Spangled Banner, was at the center of the effort.
sentences.chinese: 美国著名的旗帜，星条旗，被列为主要保护对象。

sentences.english: The Star-Spangled Banner went to a special conservation laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 星条旗被运送到特殊保存实验室中。

sentences.english: Tis the star-spangled banner; oh, long may it wave.
sentences.chinese: 这是星条旗，哦，愿它永远飘扬。

sentences.english: Wearing stars and stripes, a cowboy watches rodeo events from the chutes.
sentences.chinese: 一位身着星条旗服装的牛仔在斜槽后观看着骑术表演。

sentences.english: Many patterns, like the 50-star flag, have both.
sentences.chinese: 许多模式下，像是50星条旗，则是两者兼顾的。

sentences.english: A band, with fife and drum, played “The Star Spangled Banner.”
sentences.chinese: 一个有鼓和横笛的乐队，演奏了“星条旗”。

sentences.english: The flag held by the soldiers was painted in the stars and stripes of the US flag.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们高举的旗帜也被绘成了美国的星条旗。

definition: Union Jack (flag of the United Kingdom)

pinyin: Mei3 li4 jian1 He2 zhong4 guo2

definition: Arlington National Cemetery in Washington DC, USA
pinyin: A1 ling2 dun4 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 mu4

definition: the hammer and sickle (flag of USSR, symbolizing rural and proletarian labor)
